question: What makes the asteroid Psyche unique among other asteroids?
options: It is made entirely of ice
It is the smallest asteroid in our solar system
It appears to be the exposed nickel-iron core of an early planet
It has a colorful surface like a rainbow

question: What material is the asteroid Psyche made of?
Which university is leading the Psyche mission?
What is the main propulsion method used by the Psyche spacecraft?
What is one of the science objectives of the Psyche mission?
options: Determine whether Psyche was formed under conditions more oxidizing or more reducing than Earth's core

question: What type of communication technology will the Psyche mission test?

options: To study the asteroid's surface composition
To test a new laser communication technology
To measure the asteroid's gravitational field

question: Which part of the electromagnetic spectrum does the DSOC technology use?

Which scientific instrument is NOT part of the payload aboard the Psyche spacecraft?
Who discovered the asteroid Psyche?
What is the estimated density of asteroid Psyche?
What is the average distance of Psyche from the Sun?

options: It was once a gas giant that lost its atmosphere
It formed from the collision of two smaller asteroids
It is the remnant core material of a planetesimal
It was sculpted by the gravitational pull of nearby planets

Which technology is the Psyche mission testing for communication between the spacecraft and Earth?
What instruments are included on the Psyche spacecraft?
options: Gamma-Ray and Neutron Spectrometer, Multispectral Imager, and Magnetometer

question: Which instrument provides high-resolution images using filters to discriminate between Psyche’s metallic and silicate constituents?

Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Technical University of Denmark (DTU)

question: Which instrument will detect, measure, and map Psyche’s elemental composition?

options: Applied Physics Laboratory at Johns Hopkins University
Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Technical University of Denmark (DTU)

question: What is the primary purpose of the Psyche Magnetometer?
options: To detect and measure the remanent magnetic field of the asteroid
To provide high-resolution images of Psyche's surface
To communicate between the spacecraft and Earth
